name: Hell Hound
languages: Understands Infernal but can't speak it

specialAbilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
specialAbilities.description: The hound has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

specialAbilities.name: Pack Tactics
specialAbilities.description: The hound has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hound's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath
actions.description: The hound exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
